name: Morondanga Republik: Marla Reliquia & Perla Inés
description:
It is known that our beloved former president Marla Reliquia Cerezo was a unique person in the history of our Republic, but not in her mother's womb, since Marla had a Siamese sister: Perla Inés.

When Marla devoted herself to beekeeping, Perla Inés committed those hours to reading science fiction. When Perla Inés spent thousands of hours practicing on the piano, Marla Reliquia rambled on and invented poems that she later recited at amateur poetry festivals.

They didn’t call "dead hours" when they did something to support the interests of the other. They called it "SISTERS’ DOORS”. Since they didn’t have much time to spend alone, they used the Sisters' Doors to self-absorbed and develop as individuals, to be in their own rooms.

When Marla became President of Morondanga Republik, Perla Inés turned her soul completely over to Peppology, a door that she never closed again.
